sentences.en: Coverdale quickly becomes disillusioned with farm work.
sentences.cn: 科弗代尔对农业劳动的幻想很快就破灭了.

sentences.en: Hamlet was disillusioned in his mother.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特对他母亲的幻想破灭了.

sentences.en: He disillusioned his fans by his sloppy play.
sentences.cn: 他草率的表演使他的崇拜者大失所望.

sentences.en: He had become disillusioned because he could not find a job.
sentences.cn: 他因找不到工作而备感失望。

sentences.en: He romanticized the past as he became disillusioned with his present.
sentences.cn: 当他对现在不再抱任何幻想时，便把过去想得非常浪漫。

sentences.en: He was disillusioned and returned unsatisfied.
sentences.cn: 但是他的幻想破灭了,未能如愿地返回.

sentences.en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentences.en: I soon became disillusioned with the job.
sentences.cn: 我不久便对这个工作不再抱幻想了。

sentences.en: I've become very disillusioned with politics.
sentences.cn: 我对政治完全不再抱幻想了。

sentences.en: John is disillusioned with life in general.
sentences.cn: 约翰对整个生活失去了信心.

sentences.en: Many people who are disillusioned in reality assimilate life to a dream.
sentences.cn: 许多对现实失望的人把人生比作一场梦.
她的梦想不久就幻灭了.

sentences.en: She's disillusioned with life in general.
sentences.cn: 她对生活各方面均不抱幻想了.

sentences.en: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都已经倦了，腻了，也死心了。

sentences.en: Yes, I've grown cynical, I'm totally disillusioned about everyone and everything.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我已看破红尘.我对一切人、一切事都不抱幻想.

words.tran_cn: 使幻想破灭（disillusion的过去分词）；唤醒

trans.tran_cn: 醒悟的，幻想破灭的，不抱幻想的，大失所望的
trans.tran_en: disappointed because you have lost your belief that someone is good, or that an idea is right

trans.tran_cn: 使不再抱幻想，使理想破灭( disillusion的过去式和过去分词)，唤醒
